author: ate
msg: A hopefully stronger handling of the NPE situation David Taylor encountered (see previous change) in the checkMonitorSession method.

author: sichen
msg: When store email as communication, set datetimeStarted and datetimeEnded as the current timestamp

author: mrglavas
msg: Fixing a bug Ron Gavlin reported on the j-users list. When processing schema documents
we mark the DOM nodes we've processed as "hidden" so that we don't revisit them. For
input from Xerces' DOM implementation we were marking the nodes directly. If the same
DOM was fed again to the schema loader the nodes were still marked as hidden and so
weren't being processed. We should never mutate a user supplied DOM. I've modified the
code so that we always use the hidden node Hashtable if the input is anything other than

author: ggregory
msg: HashCodeBuilder throws java.lang.StackOverflowError when an object contains a cycle.

author: pdodds
msg: Added base code for the JAX-WS annotated POJO archetype for the servicemix-jsr181 service engine
